title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834 occurred in the build 2002071610021. The issue arises when deleting items from the Coolbar, causing the layout to become corrupted.
OB:
When running the attached test case:
1. Dragging the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem).
2. Dragging the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item.
3. Dragging the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
4. Dragging the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on first row), placing it after the Search coolitem.
5. Pressing the Delete button.
   The first item on the second row is deleted.
   Notice that the entire second row is removed when the delete operation occurs.
EB: The second row should remain after deleting the first item on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row.
3. Drag the Launch coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Script item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Search coolitem.
